Except Brunswick and Macon, events are on Wednesdays and Saturdays in: Atlanta, Albany, Brunswick (Glynn), Decatur (North DeKalb), Douglasville, East Point (South Fulton), Griffin (Clayton), Macon, McDonough (Henry), Morrow (Clayton), Savannah.
